sample_docs: Toonstar is a tech-driven animation studio †building entertainment franchises with world-class storytellers Toonstar is a tech-driven animation studio †building entertainment franchises with world-class storytellers About us We're a nimble team of creators, builders and technologists hailing from Disney, Warner Bros. + Dreamworks with AI-powered production tech and direct audience building capabilities that have cultivated some of the largest + most engaged communities on the internet. John Attanasio ceo Luisa Huang COO We're a nimble team of creators, builders and technologists hailing from Disney, Warner Bros. + Dreamworks with AI-powered production tech and direct audience building capabilities that have cultivated some of the largest + most engaged communities on the internet. As Featured By "AI-Powered Animation Studio Toonstar Signs With WME" "Toonstar has already delivered a blueprint for success...Put bluntly they're not carpet baggers." "Toonstar Uses AI To Power Hit YouTube Series" "Toonstar Uses AI To Power Hit YouTube Series††View Article " ... there's an innovative new outfit blazing a new path to creating and distributing content.††View Article "[Toonstar's] tech and the emergence of AI for production purposes will open the industry up to new storytellers and unlock new IP.††View Article "Toonstar's an anecdote to Hollywood's IP-driven wave of superhero content and high-profile adaptations that can leave little room for new voices.††View Article "Toonstar is reaching tens of millions of people weekly through shows like "StEvEn & Parker." †View Article "…as soon as I encountered StEvEn & Parker, I knew in my gut that it should be a children's book.†- Phoebe Yeh †View Article "The Gimmicks allows us to experiment with what it looks like to create in and around a community, taking the tech seriously but keeping the content fun.†- Mila Kunis †View Article "... groundbreaking way for fans to participate, enjoy and actually be in the show..." †View Article "Toonstar is absolutely showing the broader entertainment industry how to open doors for new creators and uncover great new IP.†- Jon Heder View Article "Animation is the entertainment segment poised to address these (industry) problems by leveraging AI.†View Article " In an industry first, the series…also features a character voiced entirely by AI." †View Article "...connecting with people in a new way is really exciting… and it is industry-changing." - TJ Miller †View Article "Television could become a lot more interactive." View Article "Space Junk is more than traditional animation.††View Article "Traditional television is old, slow, and corporate. Things don't happen quickly …versus with Toonstarâ€: View Article " The Gimmicks" is also something more. Toonstar is an animation story studio †building entertainment franchises with frontier tech + next-gen storytellers Toonstar is an animation story studio †building entertainment franchises with frontier tech + next-gen storytellers Our digital series Tap to read details The Gimmicks A ragtag group of wrestlers recruit a recently fired superstar in order to save their failing wrestling promotion. But it will be enough to keep them in the ring? Tap to read details House of Chico A disgraced American luchador must return to his family in Mexico. But when he arrives, his family's wrestling empire is threatened by a nefarious new promoter. Tap to read details StEvEn + Parker StEvEn + Parker keep big brother Parker on his toes with their mischief, adventure and intense cravings for dinosaur shaped chicken nuggets. Tap to read details Space Junk The son of a famous missing astronaut takes to the stars…as a garbageman. Tap to read details FORTUN3 Coming Soon! A ragtag group of wrestlers recruit a recently fired superstar in order to save their failing wrestling promotion. But it will be enough to keep them in the ring? A disgraced American luchador must return to his family in Mexico. But when he arrives, his family's wrestling empire is threatened by a nefarious new promoter. StEvEn + Parker keep big brother Parker on his toes with their mischief, adventure and intense cravings for dinosaur shaped chicken nuggets. The son of a famous missing astronaut takes to the stars…as a garbageman. About us We're a nimble team of creators, builders and technologists hailing from Disney, Warner Bros. + DreamWorks with AI-powered production tech and direct-to-community building expertise that's cultivated some of the largest + most engaged communities on the internet. John Attanasio ceo Luisa Huang COO We're a nimble team of creators, builders and technologists hailing from Disney, Warner Bros. + DreamWorks with AI-powered production tech and direct-to-community building expertise that's cultivated some of the largest + most engaged communities on the internet.
